quote_0: You know what *else* could draw a crowd? A golfer with an arm growing out of his ass.
quote_1: Damn you people. Go back to your shanties.
quote_2: Damn you people. This is golf. Not a rock concert.
quote_3: Ah ah. You lay another finger on me, I burn the house down and piss on the ashes.
quote_4: You're in big trouble though, pal. I eat pieces of shit like you for breakfast!
quote_5: Just stay out of my way... or you'll pay! LISTEN to what I say!
